site.title: Rounak Naik | Full Stack Developer
site.description: Professional portfolio of Rounak Naik - Full Stack Developer & UI Designer specializing in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

personalInfo.name: Rounak Naik
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer currently pursuing my Bachelor's in Computer Engineering, blending academic knowledge with 5+ years of hands-on development experience. My journey has taken me across both national and international projects, giving me a unique perspective on building scalable, user-centric applications.

education.title: Education
education.content: Currently pursuing Bachelor's in Computer Engineering with majors in Artifical Intelligence and Machine learning from Padre conceicao college of engineering, Goa, India.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: 5+ years of experience in full-stack development, working with startups and established companies. Specialized in Flutte, Firebase, Node.js, React.js and modern web technologies.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
whatIDo.content: I create beautiful, functional cross-platform applications that solve real-world problems. From concept to deployment, I handle every aspect of the development process.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.content: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user experiences that are both beautiful and intuitive. Every project is an opportunity to learn and grow.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured online store with product catalog, cart functionality, and Stripe payment integration. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering and optimized performance.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A productivity application with drag-and-drop task boards, real-time updates, and team collaboration features. Uses Firebase for backend services.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather application showing current conditions and 5-day forecast for any location. Integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features smooth animations and optimized performance.

awards.title: Best Web App Award
awards.description: Awarded for innovative use of serverless architecture in the E-Commerce Platform project.

awards.title: Hackathon Champion
awards.description: Won first place in the 24-hour hackathon for developing a mental health tracking application.

awards.title: Developer of the Year
awards.description: Recognized for outstanding contributions to the developer community and mentorship of junior developers.

events.title: Guest Speaker - Web Accessibility
events.description: Presented on implementing WCAG 2.1 guidelines in modern web applications.

events.title: Workshop Leader - React Hooks
events.description: Conducted hands-on workshop teaching best practices for using React Hooks.

events.title: Panel Discussion - Future of Web Development
events.description: Participated in a panel discussion about emerging trends in web development.

journey.title: Launched SaaS Product
journey.description: Developed and launched my own SaaS product for small businesses, handling all aspects from coding to marketing.

journey.title: Full-time Freelancing
journey.description: Transitioned to full-time freelance development, working with clients across North America and Europe.

journey.title: First Client Project
journey.description: Completed my first paid freelance project - a WordPress site for a local bakery.

journey.title: Started Learning Web Development
journey.description: Began self-teaching web development through online courses and building personal projects.

techStack.name: Flutter
techStack.description: Core framework for cross-platform mobile and development

techStack.name: React.js
techStack.description: Modern UI library for building interactive interfaces

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's work together!

meta.keywords: Full Stack Developer, React Developer, Node.js Developer, Web Developer, UI Designer, Freelance Developer
meta.author: Rounak Naik
